what: mwfertiliserpilot: Fertilizer management pilot survey for maize cultivation in Ntonda EPA, Malawi — mwfertiliserpilot
title: mwfertiliserpilot: Fertilizer management pilot survey for maize cultivation in Ntonda EPA, Malawi — mwfertiliserpilot
text: July 2024, 129 farmers surveyed fertilizer management maize cultivation Ntonda Extension Planning Area (EPA) Blantyre District, Southern Region Malawi.
